paper_abstract: Purpose - The purpose of this paper is to solve the heavy computational problem of parameter estimation algorithm. Design/methodology/approach - Presents a decomposition least squares based iterative identification algorithm. Findings - Can estimate the parameters for linear or pseudo-linear systems and have lower computational burden. Originality/value - This paper adopts a decomposition technique to solve engineering computation problems and offers a potential and efficient algorithm.
paper_title: Decomposition based least squares iterative estimation algorithm for output error moving average systems
